text:
Yesterday, I finished reading <@UEH6T3RJB>’s paper _An Anatomy of Interaction: Co-occurrences and Entanglements_ <https://www.shift-society.org/salon/papers/2018/revised/anatomy-of-interaction-authorversion.pdf>.

Today, I just read ribbonfarm’s blog post _Worlding Raga: 5 — World How?_ <https://www.ribbonfarm.com/2019/04/25/worlding-raga-5-world-how/>.

In a strange way for me these two resonate with overlapping frequencies creating beautiful harmony, although I can’t quite put my finger on what exactly makes me think that.

attachments.title: Worlding Raga: 5 — World How?
attachments.text: A bit of fun synchronicity. A few weeks ago, I came up with a snowcloned line inspired by a famous tldr of general relativity: narratives tell archetypes how to evolve, archetypes tell narratives h…
